channel.title: ::bank command donators+

item.title: ::bank command donators+
item.dc:creator: @horses2007 horses2007
item.description:
@horses2007 wrote:

okay, i added it in, but still on my donator account it won’t allow him to open up the bank when i type in ::bank.

EDIT: I got it, I had the command in my :owner: commands so i switched it to my player commands and it doesn’t work with reg players so thanks for the help, means alot!

Read full topic

item.title: ::bank command donators+
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

LOOL the command you have now gives people donator.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && c.isDonator >= 1 || c.playerRights >= 1) {
                                c.getPA().openUpBank();
                        }

This makes it with anyone with isDonator 1 or greater to use the bank, same with people with playerRights of 1 or more.

Read full topic

item.title: ::bank command donators+
item.dc:creator: @horses2007 horses2007
item.description:
@horses2007 wrote:

Okay so my ::bank command is like admins+ or something.
i have no idea how to make it to where donators can use it to,

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { c.isDonator = 1; c.getPA().openUpBank(); }
As you see, i tried to put in c.isDonator = 1; but it did nothing and didn’t give me any compiler errors either
how would i make this command donators+? thanks for the help.

Read full topic
